subject: Baseball
Adoptions
lead_paragraph: Refsnyder, a second baseman in the Yankees’ farm system, may become an even greater inspiration to adopted children and adoptive parents if he reaches the kind of success he and the Yankees expect.
snippet: Refsnyder, a second baseman in the Yankees’ farm system, may become an even greater inspiration to adopted children and adoptive parents if he reaches the kind of success he and the Yankees expect.
